headline.main: Illinois Policeman Died of Apparent Suicide: Newspaper
headline.print_headline: Illinois Policeman Died of Apparent Suicide: Newspaper

docs.snippet: A northern Illinois policeman killed by gunshots in early September, whose death sparked a massive manhunt for clues, died of an apparent suicide, the Chicago Tribune reported on Tuesday citing law enforcement sources....
docs.lead_paragraph: A northern Illinois policeman killed by gunshots in early September, whose death sparked a massive manhunt for clues, died of an apparent suicide, the Chicago Tribune reported on Tuesday citing law enforcement sources.

headline.main: Larkin Leads Red Wings to 2-1 Win Over Lightning
headline.print_headline: Larkin Leads Red Wings to 2-1 Win Over Lightning

docs.snippet: Detroit rookie Dylan Larkin broke a third-period tie and gave the Red Wings a 2-1 victory over the Tampa Bay Lightning on Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Detroit rookie Dylan Larkin broke a third-period tie and gave the Red Wings a 2-1 victory over the Tampa Bay Lightning on Tuesday night.

headline.main: Results Show Larry Bird's Brother Narrowly Losing Election
headline.print_headline: Results Show Larry Bird's Brother Narrowly Losing Election

docs.snippet: It looks like the mayor of Terre Haute will hold onto his job with a narrow victory over the older brother of Basketball Hall of Famer Larry Bird, if unofficial results stand....
docs.lead_paragraph: It looks like the mayor of Terre Haute will hold onto his job with a narrow victory over the older brother of Basketball Hall of Famer Larry Bird, if unofficial results stand.

headline.main: Teague Lifts Balanced Hawks Past Heat, 98-92
headline.print_headline: Teague Lifts Balanced Hawks Past Heat, 98-92

docs.snippet: Mike Budenholzer was staring down at his erasable whiteboard, drawing up a play with just under 9 seconds remaining as his Atlanta Hawks held a four-point lead....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike Budenholzer was staring down at his erasable whiteboard, drawing up a play with just under 9 seconds remaining as his Atlanta Hawks held a four-point lead.

headline.main: Pacers Get First Win, Hand Pistons First Loss This Season
headline.print_headline: Pacers Get First Win, Hand Pistons First Loss This Season

docs.snippet: Rodney Stuckey scored 23 points against his former team, Paul George added 16 points and nine rebounds and the Indiana Pacers beat the Detroit Pistons 94-82 on Tuesday night for their first victory....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rodney Stuckey scored 23 points against his former team, Paul George added 16 points and nine rebounds and the Indiana Pacers beat the Detroit Pistons 94-82 on Tuesday night for their first victory.

docs.snippet: Ruth Bloomfield Margolin returns to play with us....

headline.main: Mississippi Republican Governor Phil Bryant Re-elected: Media Reports
headline.print_headline: Mississippi Republican Governor Phil Bryant Re-elected: Media Reports

docs.snippet: Mississippi Republican Governor Phil Bryant won re-election to a second term on Tuesday, easily defeating a little-known opponent in the conservative Southern state, according to local media reports and CNN projections....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mississippi Republican Governor Phil Bryant won re-election to a second term on Tuesday, easily defeating a little-known opponent in the conservative Southern state, according to local media reports and CNN projections.

headline.main: Seguin Leads Stars to 5-3 Win at Boston
headline.print_headline: Seguin Leads Stars to 5-3 Win at Boston

docs.snippet: Tyler Seguin scored three goals against his former team as the Dallas Stars beat the Boston Bruins 5-3 on Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tyler Seguin scored three goals against his former team as the Dallas Stars beat the Boston Bruins 5-3 on Tuesday night.

headline.main: Colorado Voters Oust 3 Conservative School Board Members
headline.print_headline: Colorado Voters Oust 3 Conservative School Board Members

docs.snippet: Suburban Denver voters on Tuesday ousted three conservative school board members who changed the way teachers are paid and briefly considered reviewing a U.S. history curriculum to promote patriotism....
docs.lead_paragraph: Suburban Denver voters on Tuesday ousted three conservative school board members who changed the way teachers are paid and briefly considered reviewing a U.S. history curriculum to promote patriotism.

headline.main: Japan Post Bank Could Step Up Shift From JGBs to Other Assets-President
headline.print_headline: Japan Post Bank Could Step Up Shift From JGBs to Other Assets-President

docs.snippet: Newly privatized Japan Post Bank Co could accelerate a shift away from Japanese government bonds in its $1.7 trillion portfolio, buying billions of dollars of domestic and overseas equities to boost returns as a listed company, its chief said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Newly privatized Japan Post Bank Co could accelerate a shift away from Japanese government bonds in its $1.7 trillion portfolio, buying billions of dollars of domestic and overseas equities to boost returns as a listed company, its chief said.
